verses.kjv: I will extol thee, my God, O king; and I will bless thy name for ever and ever.
verses.ct: I will lift you up, my God and King; I will honor your name forever and ever.

verses.kjv: Every day will I bless thee; and I will praise thy name for ever and ever.
verses.ct: Every day I will honor you, and I will praise your name forever and ever.

verses.kjv: Great is the LORD, and greatly to be praised; and his greatness is unsearchable.
verses.ct: The LORD is great and deserves the highest praise; his greatness has no limit that anyone can find.

verses.kjv: One generation shall praise thy works to another, and shall declare thy mighty acts.
verses.ct: Each generation will celebrate your works to the next, telling them about your mighty acts.

verses.kjv: I will speak of the glorious honour of thy majesty, and of thy wondrous works.
verses.ct: I will talk about the magnificent splendor of your majesty and about your amazing works.

verses.kjv: And men shall speak of the might of thy terrible acts: and I will declare thy greatness.
verses.ct: People will tell of the power behind your awe-inspiring acts, and I will proclaim your greatness.

verses.kjv: They shall abundantly utter the memory of thy great goodness, and shall sing of thy righteousness.
verses.ct: They will pour out the memory of your overwhelming goodness and sing joyfully about your righteousness.

verses.kjv: The LORD is gracious, and full of compassion; slow to anger, and of great mercy.
verses.ct: The LORD is gracious and filled with compassion, patient and rich in mercy.

verses.kjv: The LORD is good to all: and his tender mercies are over all his works.
verses.ct: The LORD is good to everyone, and his tender mercy extends over everything he has made.

verses.kjv: All thy works shall praise thee, O LORD; and thy saints shall bless thee.
verses.ct: Everything you have made will praise you, LORD, and your faithful ones will honor you.

verses.kjv: They shall speak of the glory of thy kingdom, and talk of thy power;
verses.ct: They will talk about the glory of your kingdom and speak of your power,

verses.kjv: To make known to the sons of men his mighty acts, and the glorious majesty of his kingdom.
verses.ct: so that all people may know about his mighty acts and the magnificent majesty of his kingdom.

verses.kjv: Thy kingdom is an everlasting kingdom, and thy dominion endureth throughout all generations.
verses.ct: Your kingdom is an eternal kingdom, and your rule continues through every generation.

verses.kjv: The LORD upholdeth all that fall, and raiseth up all those that be bowed down.
verses.ct: The LORD supports everyone who stumbles and lifts up everyone who is weighed down.

verses.kjv: The eyes of all wait upon thee; and thou givest them their meat in due season.
verses.ct: Every living thing looks to you with expectation, and you provide their food at just the right time.

verses.kjv: Thou openest thine hand, and satisfiest the desire of every living thing.
verses.ct: You open your hand and satisfy the needs of every living creature.

verses.kjv: The LORD is righteous in all his ways, and holy in all his works.
verses.ct: The LORD is righteous in everything he does and faithful in everything he makes.

verses.kjv: The LORD is nigh unto all them that call upon him, to all that call upon him in truth.
verses.ct: The LORD is near to everyone who calls out to him, to everyone who calls out to him sincerely.

verses.kjv: He will fulfil the desire of them that fear him: he also will hear their cry, and will save them.
verses.ct: He fulfills the desires of those who are wholeheartedly dedicated to him; he hears their cries and rescues them.

verses.kjv: The LORD preserveth all them that love him: but all the wicked will he destroy.
verses.ct: The LORD watches over everyone who loves him, but he will destroy all the wicked.

verses.kjv: My mouth shall speak the praise of the LORD: and let all flesh bless his holy name for ever and ever.
verses.ct: My mouth will speak the praises of the LORD, and let every living being honor his holy name forever and ever.
